text: Hi Andrew. I have to apologise for my late reply, first off. I'm currently away from home. The timing of us being matched coincided with me going on holiday to the US, and I've been without internet for the majority of it. I'll be back in the UK next week.
That being said, hi! Nice to finally meet you. As Dexter mentioned, is there anything you'd like to share about yourself, and what would you like to get out of this mentorship?
